title: Design REST API Schema for Booking System
task: Design a comprehensive REST API schema for a multi-service booking system that handles appointments, resources, and scheduling. The API should support different resource types (meeting rooms, equipment, personnel), handle conflicts, support recurring bookings, and provide real-time availability. Include OpenAPI specification, data models, and error handling.
context: This is for a new enterprise booking platform that will replace multiple legacy scheduling systems. The API needs to integrate with existing authentication, notification, and billing services. It must handle high concurrency and support mobile and web clients.
expected_elements: Resource models with relationships and constraints
